reviews.content: Follow up to your response.  It took you well over 1 yr to respond to the review.  That validates my claim as to how you work.  No he was not a patient of yours, because it was a NEW PATIENT APPOINTMENT. We have moved on to a much better and attentive MD.  So don't worry your self with trying to FIX the situation that occurred 6/2017.  Just do better with the patients you have.
